meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sticky.
meanings.sent1: The stickinesses of the tape made it perfect for hanging up posters.
meanings.sent2: I had to wash my hands multiple times to get rid of the stickinesses from the spilled syrup.
meanings.sent3: The stickinesses of the glue caused a funny mishap when my papers got stuck together.
meanings.sent4: The stickinesses of the situation made it hard to move forward.
meanings.sent5: The stickinesses of the honey on the toast made it a delicious treat.

meanings.definition: The ability to adhere to surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The stickinesses of the adhesive allowed the poster to stay on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The stickinesses of the tape kept the package securely sealed.
meanings.sent3: The stickinesses of the sticker made it challenging to remove without tearing.
meanings.sent4: The stickinesses of the gum held the wrapper tightly closed.
meanings.sent5: The stickinesses of the label kept it firmly in place on the jar.

meanings.sent1: The stickinesses of the burrs caused them to cling to my clothes.
meanings.sent2: The stickinesses of the lint roller picked up all the pet hair from the couch.
meanings.sent3: The stickinesses of the tape made it hard to separate the pieces.
meanings.sent4: The stickinesses of the magnet kept the paperclip attached to it.
meanings.sent5: The stickinesses of the label made it stay on the package during shipping.
